      • addOffer

        public RetailerOfferResponse addOffer(Long accountId,
                             List<Long> retailerLocationIds,
                             String title,
                             String subTitle,
                             String details,
                             String subDetails,
                             String finePrint,
                             Enums.BarCodeType barcodeType,
                             String barcodeEntry,
                             String externalRedeemAuth,
                             Long ticketsReward,
                             Long activated,
                             Long expires,
                             Boolean noExpiration,
                             Integer availableLimit,
                             Integer availableLimitPerUser,
                             Integer viewLimit,
                             Integer maxPrints,
                             Long ticketPrice,
                             Double fullPrice,
                             Double discountPrice,
                             Boolean showRemaining,
                             Boolean showRedeemed,
                             Boolean replaced,
                             Boolean featured,
                             Enums.OfferType offerType,
                             Enums.SpecialOfferType specialOfferType,
                             Enums.OfferVisibility offerVisibility,
                             List<Long> categoryIds,
                             List<Long> filterIds,
                             Boolean active,
                             Long barcodeAssetId,
                             Long imageAssetId,
                             Long imageAssetId1,
                             Long imageAssetId2,
                             Long imageAssetId3,
                             Long imageAssetId4,
                             Long imageAssetId5,
                             String publisher,
                             Long redeemableStart,
                             Long redeemableEnd,
                             String brand,
                             Enums.ProductType productType,
                             Enums.ConditionType conditionType,
                             String isbn,
                             String asin,
                             String catalogNumbers,
                             String department,
                             String features,
                             Double minimumPrice,
                             Double width,
                             Double height,
                             Double depth,
                             Double weight,
                             Enums.UnitType unit,
                             String studio,
                             String parentalRating,
                             Long publishDate,
                             Long availabilityDate,
                             Long sizeId,
                             Long listingId,
                             Integer duration,
                             String author,
                             Long releaseDate)
                               throws SirqulException
        Create an offer and assign it to the provided retailer locations.

        Target API Endpoint: /retailer/offer/create
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account id (deviceId or accountId required)
        retailerLocationIds - Comma separated list of retailer location ids. This will assign the offer to these retailer locations.
        title - The title (255 char limit)
        subTitle - The sub title (255 char limit)
        details - The details
        subDetails - A string for custom details (255 char limit)
        finePrint - The fine print
        barcodeType - The bar code type {NONE, UPC, CODE_128, QR, CUSTOM_MEDIA}
        barcodeEntry - The bar code entry string
        externalRedeemAuth - An external integer identifier. What the identifier will be used for will be up to the frontend developer.
        ticketsReward - Determines how many tickets are awarded
        activated - The date of when the offer will be visible to consumers
        expires - The date of when the offer expires
        noExpiration - Overrides the expiration date so that the offer does not expire
        availableLimit - The limit of how many times the offer can be used by consumers
        availableLimitPerUser - The limit of how many times a user can used the same offer
        viewLimit - The limit of how many times the offer can be viewed
        maxPrints - The maximum number of times the offer can be printed
        ticketPrice - The cost of the offer in tickets
        fullPrice - The retail/full price cost of the offer in real currency
        discountPrice - The cost of the offer at a discounted price (what the consumer pays)
        showRemaining - The show remaining
        showRedeemed - The show redeemed
        replaced - The replaced
        featured - The featured
        offerType - The offer type {VOUCHER, COUPON, PRODUCT, EVENT, MEDIA}
        specialOfferType - The special offer type {ALL, REGULAR_OFFER, ACT_NOW, GET_THERE_NOW, SQOOT, TICKETS, YIPIT}
        offerVisibility - The offer visibility {PUBLIC, ALL_MISSIONS, MY_MISISONS}
        categoryIds - Comma separated list of category ids
        filterIds - Comma separated list of filter ids
        active - Sets the active flag
        barcodeAssetId - The id of the barcode asset
        imageAssetId - The id of the an offer asset
        imageAssetId1 - The id of the an offer asset
        imageAssetId2 - The id of the an offer asset
        imageAssetId3 - The id of the an offer asset
        imageAssetId4 - The id of the an offer asset
        imageAssetId5 - The id of the an offer asset
        publisher - The maker of the item.
        redeemableStart - The redeemable start date/time of the offer.
        redeemableEnd - The redeemable start date/time of the offer.
        brand - The brand. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        productType - The product type. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        conditionType - The condition. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        isbn - The ISBN id. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        asin - The ASIN id. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        catalogNumbers - The list of catelog numbers, comma seperated. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        department - The department name. The OfferType PRODUCT only.
        features - The list of features, comma seperated. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        minimumPrice - The MAP price. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        width - The width of the item. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        height - The height of the item. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        depth - The depth of the item. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        weight - The weight of the item. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        unit - The unit of measurement. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        studio - The studio name. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        parentalRating - The parental control rating. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        publishDate - The date published. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        availabilityDate - The date available. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        sizeId - The size Id. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        listingId - The ID of the event listing
        duration - The total playing time of the media item. OfferType MEDIA only.
        author - The created/author of the media item. OfferType MEDIA only.
        releaseDate - The date/time of when the media item was originally released. OfferType MEDIA only.
        Returns:
        RetailerOfferResponse on success, SirqulResponse on failure with message.
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • getOffer

        public RetailerOfferResponse getOffer(Long accountId,
                             Long offerId)
                               throws SirqulException
        Gets the offer by id.

        Target API Endpoint: /retailer/offer/get
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id
        offerId - the offer id
        Returns:
        a RetailerOfferResponse containing offer on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • getOfferDetails

        public OfferResponse getOfferDetails(Long accountId,
                            Long offerId,
                            Long offerLocationId,
                            Double distance,
                            Location location)
                              throws SirqulException
        Gets offer or offer location details as a consumer. Will check if it is a favorite if the deviceId/accountId is provided. If the offerId is provided it will look up the main offer and ignore the the offerLocationId. If no offerId is provided then an offerLocationId must be specified.

        Target API Endpoint: /offer/get
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account id for returning account information (i.e. favorites)
        offerId - The offer id (either offeLocationId or offerId must be provided)
        offerLocationId - The offer location id (either offeLocationId or offerId must be provided)
        distance - The distance of the offer from the user's current location (this is returned when the offer is searched)
        location - The location to calculate distance from the offer
        Returns:
        OfferResponse on a valid response, SirqulResponse on an invalid response
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • getOfferDetails

        @Deprecated
public OfferResponse getOfferDetails(Long accountId,
                                       Long offerId,
                                       Long offerLocationId,
                                       Double distance,
                                       Location location,
                                       Boolean transaction)
                              throws SirqulException
        Deprecated. 
        Gets offer location details as a consumer. Will check if it is a favorite if the deviceId/accountId is provided.

        Target API Endpoint: /offer/details/get
        Deprecated: see /offer/get, method also name getOfferDetails
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id for returning account information (i.e. favorites)
        offerId - The offer id (either offerLocationId or offerId must be provided).
        offerLocationId - The offer location id (either offerLocationId or offerId must be provided).
        distance - the distance of the offer from the user's current location (this is returned when the offer is searched)
        location - the location to calculate distance from the offer
        transaction - if transaction is true, it will check if the user has already added the offer to their wallet, used it, etc. and return user information with the response.
        Returns:
        a OfferResponse containing the offer details on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • getOfferLocationsForRetailers

        public SearchResponse<OfferShortResponse> getOfferLocationsForRetailers(Long accountId,
                                                               String keyword,
                                                               Long retailerId,
                                                               Long retailerLocationId,
                                                               Enums.OfferType offerType,
                                                               Enums.SpecialOfferType specialOfferType,
                                                               Enums.OfferLocationApiMap sortField,
                                                               Boolean descending,
                                                               Integer start,
                                                               Integer limit,
                                                               Boolean activeOnly)
                                                                 throws SirqulException
        Searches on offer locations, which are records that represent an offer that has been assigned to a retailer location. If an offer does not have any locations assigned, then it will NOT be returned.

        Target API Endpoint: /retailer/offer/location/search
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        keyword - The keyword used to search
        retailerId - Filter results for a specific retailer
        retailerLocationId - Filter results for a specific retailer location
        offerType - Filter results to only return COUPON, VOUCHER, PRODUCT, MEDIA, or EVENT offers
        specialOfferType - Filter results to only return REGULAR_OFFER, ACT_NOW, GET_THERE_NOW, SQOOT, or TICKETS offer specials
        sortField - The column to sort the results on. Default is "TITLE", which will sort the results by the offer title. Possible input values: {CREATED, UPDATED, ACTIVE, ACTIVATED, EXPIRES, TITLE, SUBTITLE, DETAILS, OFFER_TYPE, RETAILER_ID, RETAILER_LOCATION_ID, BILLABLE_ENTITY_NAME, RESPONSIBLE_DISPLAY}
        descending - The order to return the results. Default is false, which will return the results in ascending order.
        start - The index into the record set to start with. Default is 0.
        limit - The total number of records to return. Default is 20.
        activeOnly - Determines whether to return only active results. Default is false.
        Returns:
        SearchResponse<OfferShortResponse> on a valid response, SirqulResponse on an invalid response
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

public ListingResponse getOffersCategoriesRetailersList(Long accountId,
                                                          Long categoryId,
                                                          Long locationId,

        Gets the offers categories retailers list.
        Gets the offers categories retailers list.

        Target API Endpoint: /offer/lists/get
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account id (deviceId or accountId required, deviceId sent automatically)
        categoryId - The category to filter by
        locationId - The location id
        location - The location of where the search will center at
        searchRange - The range of the search
        keyword - The keyword to filter results by
        categories - List of category ids
        filters - List of filter ids
        type - The special offer type {ALL, REGULAR_OFFER, ACT_NOW, GET_THERE_NOW, SQOOT, TICKETS, YIPIT}
        ignoreMap - the ignore map
        start - the start index for pagination
        limit - the limit for pagination
        Returns:
        a ListingResponse containing offers categories retailers list on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • getOffersList

        public OfferListResponse getOffersList(Long accountId,
                              Location location,
                              Double searchRange,
                              String keyword,
                              List<Long> categoryIds,
                              List<Long> filters,
                              List<Enums.OfferType> offerTypes,
                              Enums.SpecialOfferType type,
                              Enums.SortFilter sortField,
                              Long locationId,
                              Boolean includeMission,
                              Integer start,
                              Integer limit)
                                throws SirqulException
        Gets the offers list.

        Target API Endpoint: /offer/lists
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account id for returning account information (i.e. offer transactions made by the user)
        location - the location of where the search will center at
        searchRange - the range of the search
        keyword - the keyword to filter results by
        categoryIds - list of category ids to filter by
        filters - list of filter ids
        offerTypes - Comma separated list of offer types {COUPON, VOUCHER, PRODUCT, MEDIA, EVENT}
        type - The special offer type {ALL, REGULAR_OFFER, ACT_NOW, GET_THERE_NOW, SQOOT, TICKETS, YIPIT}
        sortField - The field to sort the result set on {DISTANCE, BUSINESS_NAME}
        locationId - Only return offers for the specific retailer location.
        includeMission - If true include the mission response as part of the offer. Default is false.
        start - the start index for pagination
        limit - the limit for pagination
        Returns:
        a OfferListResponse containing offers list on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • getOfferTransactionsForRetailers

        public SearchResponse<OfferShortResponse> getOfferTransactionsForRetailers(Long accountId,
                                                                  String keyword,
                                                                  Long retailerId,
                                                                  Long retailerLocationId,
                                                                  Long offerId,
                                                                  Long offerLocationId,
                                                                  Boolean redeemed,
                                                                  Enums.CouponType offerType,
                                                                  Enums.SpecialOfferType specialOfferType,
                                                                  List<Long> customerAccountIds,
                                                                  Enums.OfferTransactionApiMap sortField,
                                                                  Boolean descending,
                                                                  Integer start,
                                                                  Integer limit,
                                                                  Boolean activeOnly)
                                                                    throws SirqulException
        Searches on offer transactions for offers that the account has access to.

        Target API Endpoint: /retailer/offer/transaction/search
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required, deviceId sent automatically)
        keyword - The keyword to search for
        retailerId - Filter results for this retailer
        retailerLocationId - Filter results for this retailer location
        offerId - Filter results for this offer
        offerLocationId - Filter results for this offer location
        redeemed - if true return redeemed transactions (status 2), if false return active transactions (status 0 or 1)
        offerType - Filter results to only return COUPON or VOUCHER offers
        specialOfferType - Filter results to only return REGULAR_OFFER, ACT_NOW, GET_THERE_NOW, SQOOT, or TICKETS offer specials
        customerAccountIds - Filter results by accounts
        sortField - Determines what to sort the results by {CREATED, UPDATED, SEARCH_TAGS, ACTIVE, ACTIVATED, EXPIRES, TITLE, SUBTITLE, OFFER_TYPE, SPECIAL_OFFER_TYPE, OFFER_VISIBILITY, COUPON_TYPE, CUSTOMER_ID, CUSTOMER_DISPLAY, RETAILER_ID, RETAILER_NAME, RETAILER_LOCATION_ID, RETAILER_LOCATION_NAME, BILLABLE_ENTITY_ID, BILLABLE_ENTITY_NAME, RESPONSIBLE_DISPLAY}
        descending - Determines whether the results are in descending order
        start - The start index for pagination
        limit - The limit for pagination
        activeOnly - Determines whether to only return active offer transactions
        Returns:
        SearchResponse<OfferShortResponse> on a valid response, SirqulResponse on an invalid response.
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • getPurchasedVouchers

        @Deprecated
public ListResponse<PurchasedVoucherData> getPurchasedVouchers(Long accountId,
                                                                 String filters)
                                                        throws SirqulException
        Deprecated. see getOfferTransactionsForRetailers
        Get purchased vouchers. (NOTE: this searches on OfferTransactions)

        Target API Endpoint: /retailer/getPurchasedVouchers
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        filters - json string of query parameters
        Returns:
        ListResponse<PurchasedVoucherData> on a valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • getTopOfferTransactions

        public OfferListResponse getTopOfferTransactions(Integer start,
                                        Integer limit)
                                          throws SirqulException
        Gets the top active offers.

        Target API Endpoint: /offer/top
        Parameters:
        start - The index into the record set to start with. Default is 0.
        limit - The total number of record to return. Default is 20.
        Returns:
        OfferListResponse if valid, otherwise SirqulResponse
        Throws:

      • getVoucherDetails

        @Deprecated
public ListResponse<PurchasedVoucherData> getVoucherDetails(Long accountId,
                                                              String filters)
                                                     throws SirqulException
        Deprecated. see getOfferTransactionsForRetailer
        Get voucher details, this searches on OfferTransactions and returns the list. If no filters are provided it will will return all active offer transactions for the retailer locations the user is a manager of. An active transaction has a status of 0 or 1. The filters can have 3 different values to then reduce the default list down: locid - if provided (retailer location id) only return offer transactions for the retailer location specified. type - if provided only return offer transactions of that type. 0 is not redeemable yet, 1 is redeemable, and 2 is redeemed. q - query the results, searches retailer location name, customer email, and redemption code. offer transactions of 0 will not show the redemption code or customer email unless you search for the email exactly or provide 4 consecutive letters of the redemption code.

        Target API Endpoint: /retailer/getVoucherDetails
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        filters - json string of query parameters
        Returns:
        ListResponse<PurchasedVoucherData> on a valid response, SirqulResponse on an invalid response
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

public ListResponse<PurchasedVoucherData> redeemVoucher(Long accountId,
                                                          String filters)

      • removeOffer

                         Long offerId)
                           throws SirqulException
        Set the deleted timestamp to current time. This effectively deletes the offer since all queries should ignore any records with a deleted time stamp.

        Target API Endpoint: /retailer/offer/delete
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account used to perform the delete, must have rights to edit the offer.
        offerId - The ID of the offer to be deleted
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • searchOffersForRetailers

        public SearchResponse<OfferShortResponse> searchOffersForRetailers(Long accountId,
                                                          String keyword,
                                                          Long retailerId,
                                                          Long retailerLocationId,
                                                          Enums.OfferType offerType,
                                                          Enums.SpecialOfferType specialOfferType,
                                                          Enums.OfferApiMap sortField,
                                                          Boolean descending,
                                                          Integer start,
                                                          Integer limit,
                                                          Boolean activeOnly)
                                                            throws SirqulException
        Get and searches on offers that the account has access to.

        Target API Endpoint: /retailer/offer/search
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        keyword - The keyword used to search
        retailerId - the retailer id
        retailerLocationId - the retailer location id
        offerType - Filter results to only return COUPON or VOUCHER offers
        specialOfferType - Filter results to only return REGULAR_OFFER, ACT_NOW, GET_THERE_NOW, SQOOT, or TICKETS offer specials,
        sortField - The column to sort the search on, Enums.OfferApiMap
        descending - determines whether the sorted list is in descending or ascending order
        start - The record to begin the return set on
        limit - The number of records to return
        activeOnly - Return only active results
        Returns:
        SearchResponse of RetailerLocationResponse on a valid response, SirqulResponse on an invalid response Enums.CouponType Enums.SpecialOfferType
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • updateOffer

        public RetailerOfferResponse updateOffer(Long accountId,
                                Long offerId,
                                List<Long> retailerLocationIds,
                                String title,
                                String subTitle,
                                String details,
                                String subDetails,
                                String finePrint,
                                Enums.BarCodeType barcodeType,
                                String barcodeEntry,
                                String externalRedeemAuth,
                                Long ticketsReward,
                                Long activated,
                                Long expires,
                                Boolean noExpiration,
                                Integer availableLimit,
                                Integer availableLimitPerUser,
                                Integer viewLimit,
                                Integer maxPrints,
                                Long ticketPrice,
                                Double fullPrice,
                                Double discountPrice,
                                Boolean showRemaining,
                                Boolean showRedeemed,
                                Boolean replaced,
                                Boolean featured,
                                Enums.OfferType offerType,
                                Enums.SpecialOfferType specialOfferType,
                                Enums.OfferVisibility offerVisibility,
                                List<Long> categoryIds,
                                List<Long> filterIds,
                                Boolean active,
                                Long barcodeAssetId,
                                Long imageAssetId,
                                Long imageAssetId1,
                                Long imageAssetId2,
                                Long imageAssetId3,
                                Long imageAssetId4,
                                Long imageAssetId5,
                                String publisher,
                                Long redeemableStart,
                                Long redeemableEnd,
                                String brand,
                                Enums.ProductType productType,
                                Enums.ConditionType conditionType,
                                String isbn,
                                String asin,
                                String catalogNumbers,
                                String department,
                                String features,
                                Double minimumPrice,
                                Double width,
                                Double height,
                                Double depth,
                                Double weight,
                                Enums.UnitType unit,
                                String studio,
                                String parentalRating,
                                Long publishDate,
                                Long availabilityDate,
                                Long sizeId,
                                Long listingId,
                                Integer duration,
                                String author,
                                Long releaseDate)
                                  throws SirqulException
        Update an offer, must provide a current list of retailer locations or the current offer locations will be marked as deleted.

        Target API Endpoint: /retailer/offer/update
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account used to perform the update, must have rights to edit the offer (deviceId or accountId required)
        offerId - The offer to update
        retailerLocationIds - Comma separated list of retailer location ids. This will assign the offer to these retailer locations.
        title - The title (255 char limit)
        subTitle - The sub title (255 char limit)
        details - The details
        subDetails - A string for custom details (255 char limit)
        finePrint - The fine print
        barcodeType - The bar code type {NONE, UPC, CODE_128, QR, CUSTOM_MEDIA}
        barcodeEntry - The bar code entry string
        externalRedeemAuth - An external integer identifier. What the identifier will be used for will be up to the frontend developer.
        ticketsReward - Determines how many tickets are awarded
        activated - The date of when the offer will be visible to consumers
        expires - The date of when the offer expires
        noExpiration - Overrides the expiration date so that the offer does not expire
        availableLimit - The limit of how many times the offer can be used by consumers
        availableLimitPerUser - The limit of how many times a user can used the same offer
        viewLimit - the view limit
        maxPrints - The maximum number of times the offer can be printed
        ticketPrice - The cost of the offer in tickets
        fullPrice - The retail/full price cost of the offer in real currency
        discountPrice - The cost of the offer at a discounted price (what the consumer pays)
        showRemaining - The show remaining
        showRedeemed - The show redeemed
        replaced - The replaced
        featured - The featured
        offerType - The offer type {VOUCHER, COUPON, PRODUCT, MEDIA, EVENT}
        specialOfferType - The special offer type {ALL, REGULAR_OFFER, ACT_NOW, GET_THERE_NOW, SQOOT, TICKETS, YIPIT}
        offerVisibility - The offer visibility {PUBLIC, ALL_MISSIONS, MY_MISISONS}
        categoryIds - Comma separated list of category ids
        filterIds - Comma separated list of filter ids
        active - Sets the active flag
        barcodeAssetId - The id of the barcode asset
        imageAssetId - The id of the an offer asset
        imageAssetId1 - The id of the an offer asset
        imageAssetId2 - The id of the an offer asset
        imageAssetId3 - The id of the an offer asset
        imageAssetId4 - The id of the an offer asset
        imageAssetId5 - The id of the an offer asset
        publisher - The maker of the item.
        redeemableStart - The redeemable start date/time of the offer.
        redeemableEnd - The redeemable start date/time of the offer.
        brand - The brand. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        productType - The product type. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        conditionType - The condition. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        isbn - The ISBN id. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        asin - The ASIN id. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        catalogNumbers - The list of catelog numbers, comma seperated. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        department - The department name. The OfferType PRODUCT only.
        features - The list of features, comma seperated. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        minimumPrice - The MAP price. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        width - The width of the item. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        height - The height of the item. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        depth - The depth of the item. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        weight - The weight of the item. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        unit - The unit of measurement. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        studio - The studio name. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        parentalRating - The parental control rating. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        publishDate - The date published. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        availabilityDate - The date available. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        sizeId - The size Id. OfferType PRODUCT only.
        listingId - The ID of the event listing
        duration - The total playing time of the media item. OfferType MEDIA only.
        author - The created/author of the media item. OfferType MEDIA only.
        releaseDate - The date/time of when the media item was originally released. OfferType MEDIA only.
        Returns:
        RetailerOfferResponse on success, or SirqulResponse with error message.
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • updateOfferStatus

                               List<Long> offerIds,
                               Boolean active)

        Target API Endpoint: /retailer/offer/status
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account used to perform the activation, must have rights to edit the offer.
        offerIds - List of offer ids
        active - Determines whether to make the offer active as well
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • updateSearchIndex

        public SirqulResponse updateSearchIndex(String appKey,
                               String searchTag,
                               Integer batchCount,
                               Integer maxUpdateSearchIndexRecords)
                                 throws SirqulException
        Updates offer locations that are marked to be saved to index reporting data.

        Target API Endpoint: /offer/location/searchindex/update
        Parameters:
        appKey - The application key - only Sirqul app is allowed
        searchTag - run for rows that have this "searchTags" value - ignores the "insearchindex" value
        batchCount - This number of records to process
        maxUpdateSearchIndexRecords - This maximum records to upload to the AWS search index at once. AWS Search has a 5MB limit for submissions so setting this too high will cause this to error out. Keep in mind that this is either the total number of RetailerLocations OR Offers since the RetailerLocation and Offer indices are updated at the same time. So the first one to reach 1000 records will trigger the save for both.
        Returns:
        list of SirqulResponse
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • updateVoucherStatus

        public SirqulResponse updateVoucherStatus(Long accountId,
                                 Long offerTransactionId,
                                 Integer status)
                                   throws SirqulException
        Redeems a voucher.

        Target API Endpoint: /retailer/voucher/updatestatus
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        offerTransactionId - the OfferTransaction ID
        status - the status to set the offer transaction to - 1 sets it to redeemable and 2 sets it to redeemed
        Returns:
        an SirqulResponse with success or fail message.
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.
